snippet.title: Niffelheim Gameplay trailer [ Steam 2018]
snippet.description:
https://store.steampowered.com/app/35...

Beautiful hand-drawn art populates a world based on Norse mythology - explore this magical land as a fierce Viking warrior while you craft the tools needed to survive the dungeon experience and the quest for pieces of the Portal to Valhalla.
